verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
De colores, de colores the fields love to
dress in all during the springtime
De colores, de colores the birds have their
clothing which come every season

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
De colores, de colores the rainbow is
vested across the blue sky
De colores and so must all love be
of every bright color that makes my heart cry
(Repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Sing the roster, sing the rooster with
his kiri kiri kiri kiri
And the cluck hen, and the cluck hen with
her kera kera kera kera
And the babe chicks, and the babe chicks with
their pio pio pio pio pi

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
De colores and so must all love be
of every bright color that makes my heart cry
(Repeat)
